2022-11-30T11-38-43Z.message: Actions job or workflow does not limit the permissions of the GITHUB_TOKEN. Consider setting an explicit permissions block, using the following as a minimal starting point: {{contents: read}}
The workflow is using a known vulnerable version ([v6.2](1)) of the [tj-actions/branch-names](2) action. Update it to [7.07](3)

2022-11-30T11-38-43Z.workflow:
name: fossa-analyze

on:
  pull_request:
    branches:
      - master
  push:
    branches:
      - master

jobs:
  fossa-analyze:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Checkout branch
        uses: actions/checkout@v3
      - name: Install Fossa CLI
        run: |
          curl -H 'Cache-Control: no-cache' https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fossas/fossa-cli/master/install-latest.sh | bash   
      - name: Get Branch Name
        id: branch-name
        uses: tj-actions/branch-names@v6.2
      - name: Set Variables
        run: |
          echo "PROJECT_TITLE=${GITHUB_REPOSITORY#*/}" >> "$GITHUB_ENV"
          echo "PROJECT_URL=${GITHUB_SERVER_UR}/${GITHUB_REPOSITORY}" >> "$GITHUB_ENV"
          echo "PROJECT_BRANCH=${{ steps.branch-name.outputs.current_branch }}" >> "$GITHUB_ENV"
      - name: Run Fossa Analyze
        run: |
          fossa analyze --branch "${{ env.PROJECT_BRANCH }}" --revision "${{ github.sha }}" --title "${{ env.PROJECT_TITLE }}" --project-url "${{ env.PROJECT_URL }}"
        env:
          FOSSA_API_KEY: 51d4e100eb0417813079fe2291ca70c2
      - name: Fossa Test
        run: |
          fossa test
        env:  
          FOSSA_API_KEY: 51d4e100eb0417813079fe2291ca70c2
